Movie & Dining: Get a 10% discount (up to Rs. 100) on movies through Bookmyshow 15 times a year.
Rewards Rate: 1 Reward Point for every Rs. 100 spent on retail spends, and 20 reward points on grocery purchases.
Reward Redemption: Redeem Rewards at RBL Rewards. 1 RP = ₹0.25.

fees_charges.Fuel Surcharge: 1% fuel surcharge waiver on transactions between Rs. 400 and Rs. 5,000.
fees_charges.Cash Advance Charges: 2.5% of the Cash Withdrawn or ₹500 (Whichever is Higher)

product_details: 2,000 bonus Reward Points as a Welcome Benefit.
This is a lifetime free credit card.
For every ₹100 spent on retail purchases, you will 1 Reward Point.
For every ₹100 spent on groceries, you will get 20 Reward Points.
